title: 6609 Segmentation fault during sync & peers quick drop from 15/50 to 1/50 in 4 seconds

body:
same problem happened again today at first run, after running new binary of latest pull. commit 5df77848bb5fd3bb0c3cfaf5a5fc95f3f743e2d6

I haven't seen this in some time. Closing for inactivity. Please re-open if this is still a valid issue.

Thanks
